name: sterling-barnacle
description: Integrates frontend and backend for managing tasks into one single page application.

scripts.build: tsc && cpx 'node_modules/eximious-barnacle/dist/*' dist/ && cpx 'node_modules/eximious-barnacle/dist/assets/**/*' dist/assets && cpx src/config.prod.json dist/assets/config/

author: Axel
